text: Be it in a graphic cut, glittery or monochrome gown, Saoirse Ronan always brings her fashion A-game to events and ceremonies. With the Oscars just over a week away, we look back at some of the Irish actress’ best red carpet looks as she prepares to find out whether she will win her nomination for Best Actress for her role in Greta Gerwig’s Lady Bird.
title: Oscars 2018: Saoirse Ronan’s best red carpet looks
